definition: Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods
variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc

sentences.english: He goes to the American hospital I tell you, Rinaldi said.
sentences.chinese: 你明儿早上就要走了，乖乖，雷那蒂说。

sentences.english: I'll give you a ring tomorrow.
I will become a scientist some day.
sentences.chinese: 明儿我也能成为一名科学家。

sentences.english: I'm sorry, but I have an interview tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 不好意思，不明儿还得参加一个面试。

sentences.english: That way you can get a good night's rest and wake up early tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 那样的话你可以睡得一晚好觉，明儿可以起个大早。

sentences.english: "Tomorrow is going to be a good day with this current, " he said.
sentences.chinese: “看这海流，明儿会是个好日子，”他说。

sentences.english: How about being a football player when you grow up?
sentences.chinese: 明儿你长大了，当个足球运动员怎样？

sentences.english: Short night, tonight, and length thyself tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 今夜就短些，明儿你再延长。

sentences.english: Ah? Well, all go back, so what is the Let's morrow a say.
sentences.chinese: 啊？好啦，全都回去吧，有啥是咱们明儿个再说。

sentences.english: What are you going to do today if tomorrow Mars hit the Earth?
sentences.chinese: 若明儿彗星撞地球，今天你要干点啥？

definition: another day/some other time/to find another day (for appointment etc)/to take a rain check
in a moment/later/also pr. [dai1 hui3 r5] or [dai1 hui5 r5]
three days from now/day after day after tomorrow
to have spare time/free from work/it's not important/it's nothing/never mind
